nodes.text: Gintwin was a commentator on Gundark's Gear Datalog during the early years of the New Republic. Gintwin warned readers of the Datalog against firing vintage pulse-wave rifles unless they thoroughly checked them first, especially for microfractures around the power cell housing and for warping and micro-corrosion of the barrel. Gintwin had come across a crate of the weapons, and upon checking them found the weapons had metal fatigue.
